trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> is placed on every control and is sized to the exact bounds of each control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>é colocado em cada controle e é dimensionado para os limites exatos de cada controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref> that represents the cursor to display when the mouse pointer is over the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"> </xref> que representa o cursor a ser exibido quando o ponteiro do mouse está sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The component with which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> is associated.
trans-unit.target: O componente com que o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> está associado.
